markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

You're able to effortlessly fight with multiple weapons simultaneously, weaving your weapons together into a storm of quick attacks. To you, continual offense is the best form of defense, and you leave little room for your foes to avoid your whirlwind of weapons.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
